reviewText: Astro Duel is the most fun you'll have shooting your lame friends in space. Except they're not lame because you'll be playing Astro Duel and yelling obsenities at each other. IT'S TIME TO DUEL.....TO ASTRO DUEL....IN SPACE.....WITH LASERS.....AND STUFF.\n\nTip: Pilot Execution mode is dope.

reviewText:
Public Review on behalf of the Opium Pulses Steam group
Disclaimer: The copy of this game was provided by the developer for review purposes

Few words about the game
Astro Duel is something that everyone among gaming community loves to see - new ideas created from something we know. Im literally amazed about how people can create something innovative, even basing on game like Asteroids. Game itself is awesome. I had to try it out against bots first and it was quite fun. Then I played it against my gf and she said that it was one of her best times we had together. Well then... ANYWAY, lets get to reviewing.

Advantages
Game offers you bunch of different arenas to play on, 3 match types and possibility to set your own few rules, so there is no way for you to get bored quickly
Nice, classic sounds. Brings back some good memories from childchood
Game was created to play with friends. And it worked out perfectly
Controls and steering is easy and nicely overlayed
Summary
As I couldn't think of any disadvantages I'll simply move right to summary. Well, game crashed on me 3 times in about 2.5h gameplay, but for unknown reasons, so I skipped that. Game provides with hours of engaging fun, even if you're playing alone, it still can be great against bots. Hope it will get some updates to expand its possibilities as there is alot of room to create new content. I also hope that one day I'll get to try it with 3 other people, it must be a crazy mess! So hesitate no more, just buy it, have fun and don't rage quit too quickly!

Personal score
9.5 / 10
If you find my review helpful or funny be sure to follow Opium Pulses curator page right here for more reviewed games!

reviewText: Astro Duel is a game that sneaks up on ya. It looks like Asteroids and Samurai Gun had a baby... but it turns out that the baby is actually like a Baby Rambo with twin uzis and insane kung fu skills and also a tail! That's how awesome this game is. I'm so stoked it's finally on Steam, cause now I can play it on my big screen and punk all my bois and baes with my insane astro dueling skills. If you're hard up for a game that will make you laugh, cry, scream, and probably get a whole pizza dumped on your head, then this is the game for you.

reviewText: If you and your friends Like Towerfall, you will love this game! Astro duel strikes a perfect balance between simplicity and depth. The added feature of controlling the pilot after your ship is destroyed gives you a great, frantic, last chance and creates some amazing comebacks. AI is challenging, but playing with friends is the best!

reviewText: Fantastic game with local multiplayer focus, and some solid single player options for if you have no friends. The controls are tight on both keyboard and on game pad (I've only used wired connections for xbox one controllers for gamepad support initially, and it works great). Multiplayer is a complete blast, and is a good way to ruin friendships in a more skill based game than mario party 5000. It runs really well on the surface pro 3, so you can also take it to a (soon to be former) friend's house and humiliate them with your amazing piloting skills. In all seriousness though, it controls super tightly, and causes players to make decisions about ammo conservation, whether or not to rush to a powerup or try to snipe somebody trying to grab one. The game performs great on my surface, and works very well with my minidisplay to hdmi adaptor on my tv. If you have a liking of local vs games like street fighter or tower fall, and enjoy asteroids, or one of those two options separately, this is the game for you.

reviewText: While it is perfectly fun and rewarding to play Astro Duel single player against computers, it really shines a 2-4P setting. It also is very fun to watch, and makes for a great event at parties as people cheer for the underdog or yell in surprise at a comeback. Definitely give this game a shot with your gamepads and friends! As others have said, Pilot Execution mode is really fun; in this mode, when your ship explodes, you can still move around your pilot in space, albeit slowly, and if you are able to survive long enough, your ship will reform and you'll get a chance at revenge :)

reviewText: Nice game. I think the maps would be better if they're a bit bigger [some of them] so the levels can be more laid of fun. & please, it's not like KML is the only perfect guy whose music fits good. We can all tell you opinions about it. & the multiplayer's main game yeah it is very good. Fun. & having not a lot of achievements ain't a problem really. Just hope that those who buy this actually enjoy it along. 9/10
